title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (tanaiste minister enterprise trade employment) order 2020

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 2. The persons mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of whose addresses
text_raw:
2. The persons mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of whose addresses 
have been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, are 
appointed to be Special Advisers to the Tánaiste and Minister for Enterprise, 
Trade and Employment with effect from 27 June 2020. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [753] 3
text_norm: 2 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser tanaiste minister enterprise trade employment effect 27 june 2020 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 5th january 2021 753 3
